name: Peak Performance (Event Horizon School)
description:
A technologically advanced civilization of dwarves is threatened by an incoming volcano eruption. Build great machinery and expand your base inside the volcano to protect your city!

DEVELOPED BY:

DINOSOFT TEAM (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 3, 2019/2020)

Game Design:

  • Antonio Vazzana
  • Manuel Bo
  • Paolo Iovino
  • Davide Cavuoto
  • Edoardo Marchetto

Programming:

  • Andrea Abissi
  • Angelo Portaluri
  • Paolo Iovino

2D Art:

  • Guglielmo Meacci
  • Matteo Facchinelli
  • Oscar Burigana

3D Art:

  • Simone Ercole
  • Beatrice Gatti
